English.Title: Milestone XProtect Licenses
English.Description: Keeping Milestone Care Plus status active allows users to update their Milestone XProtect product to the latest version as soon as it is released, without incurring additional costs. Keeping the Care Premium status active allows end users direct access to 24/7 Milestone Technical Support. In the same way, the priority in telephone calls is increased; and all Care Premium support cases receive a Service Level Agreement (SLA) for first response time and frequent status updates.

Spanish.Title: Licencias Milestone XProtect
Spanish.Description: Keeping Milestone Care Plus status active allows users to update their Milestone XProtect product to the latest version as soon as it is released, without incurring additional costs. Keeping the Care Premium status active allows end users direct access to 24/7 Milestone Technical Support. In the same way, the priority in telephone calls is increased; and all Care Premium support cases receive a Service Level Agreement (SLA) for first response time and frequent status updates.

French.Title: Licences Milestone XProtect
French.Description: Garder le statut Milestone Care Plus actif permet aux utilisateurs de mettre à jour leur produit Milestone XProtect vers la dernière version dès sa sortie, sans encourir de frais supplémentaires. Le maintien du statut Care Premium actif permet aux utilisateurs finaux d'accéder directement à l'assistance technique Milestone 24h/24 et 7j/7. De la même manière, la priorité dans les appels téléphoniques est augmentée ; et tous les cas d'assistance Care Premium reçoivent un accord de niveau de service (SLA) pour le premier temps de réponse et des mises à jour fréquentes de l'état.

Portuguese.Title: Licenças Milestone XProtect
Portuguese.Description: Manter o status Milestone Care Plus ativo permite que os usuários atualizem seu produto Milestone XProtect para a versão mais recente assim que for lançado, sem nenhum custo adicional. Manter o status Care Premium ativo dá aos usuários finais acesso direto ao suporte técnico Milestone 24 horas por dia, 7 dias por semana. Da mesma forma, aumenta a prioridade nas ligações telefônicas; e todos os casos de suporte do Care Premium recebem um Acordo de Nível de Serviço (SLA) para tempo de resposta antecipada e atualizações frequentes de status.

Spanish.Title: Rule-triggered logs
Spanish.Description: System-related information.

Spanish.Title: Audit logs
Spanish.Description: User activity.

Spanish.Title: Rule-triggered logs
Spanish.Description: Rules in which users have specified the Make new <log entry> action. For more information about the <log entry> action, see Actions and stop actions..

Spanish.Title: Server logs
Spanish.Description: The following are the types of server logs: - System log - Audit log -Rule-triggered logs. These are used to log the usage of the system. These logs are available in the Management Client under Server logs.

Spanish.Title: Servicios Milestone XProtect
Spanish.Description: Mantenerse actualizado sobre las versiones de Milestone XProtect permite a los usuarios tomar ventaja de las ultimas funciones, capacidades y optimizaciones de rendimiento. Las nuevas funciones permiten a los usuarios incrementar la confiabilidad, aumentar la seguridad y reducir costos de propiedad.
